title: This year’s climate talks saw real progress — just not on fossil fuels
description: COP30 made strides in climate finance and adaptation, but efforts to phase out fossil fuels were blocked by key nations. Brazil's Tropical Forest Facility secured significant funding, while the absence of the US was felt. Despite challenges, the talks highlighted the urgency of climate action.

title: Gas works unearth ancient marker stone under road
description: The site of the Borough Cross once marked the exact centre of Penzance.

title: Bloodied by Israel, Iran turns to ancient Persia for strength
description: After an existential crisis the regime is newly pragmatic, using past glories to unify the nation and relaxing morality rules — but dissent will not be tolerated

title: COP30 climate talks end in Brazil without roadmap to phase out fossil fuels
description: The United Nations climate talks in Brazil reached a subdued agreement at the weekend to deliver more money to countries hit hardest by climate change to help them adapt toThe post COP30 climate talks end in Brazil without roadmap to phase out fossil fuels appeared first on The Nation Newspaper.

title: An ancient Maya myth finds new life in a Mexican circus company’s performance
description: Mexican artistic director Jorge Díaz has created a unique stage adaptation of the Maya myth Popol Vuh.
